assertion.value: This study was approved by King Faisal Specialist Hospital and Research Center—Research Ethics committee. The research conformed to the principles of the Helsinki Declaration. This study was performed in line with the principles of IRB-approved research protocol (KFSRHC RAC# 2121053).
